attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like you to introduce road tax for tractors it is unfair to other road users that they are allowed on british roads without tax and they are a menace to other road users.If you introduced road tax for these vehicles then they would start using there 4x4 vehicles instead of there tractors to tow things about everywhere and so cut pollution that these tractors poison us with.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
